resources.string: Ruled by the Great king - your father. It was time of great prosperity and development. Kingdom expanded and was respected all over the continent.

When he was dying, all kingdom was mourning. And from now on, its going to be your responsibility. Will you be able continue where your father finished? Or are you gonna lead your kingdom to damnation?

A fire started out in the most eastern district of the city My King and its getting out of control for the fire patrol and the townsfolk. The fire patrol seek your permission to open the eastern floodgate to quell the flames?
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus tristique mauris id posuere tempus.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus tristique mauris id posuere tempus.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus tristique mauris id posuere tempus.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus tristique mauris id posuere tempus.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus tristique mauris id posuere tempus.

string-array.name: event_picker
string-array.item: e1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency,I have lately received some reports that there an issue with rats down as the mill./We can not stop the rats for being rats.¤food#-20/Hire some men to eradicate these vermin.¤gold#0/Just gather up some cats to handle it.¤food#-10/Tell the townsfolk that for every 10 rats that they can bring in theres a reward.¤happ#10Ögold#-20/4¤none

e2Åc4Åi1/Your excellency. Some farms in the western area are having problems with meeting up this month harvest tax./Tell the farmer the the kingdom cant handle to lower the tax and that they have to make due for now.¤happ#-10Ögold#-5/Ease their taxings this month but only this month.¤gold#-10Öfood#-10/We can not have such problems in our farms, lower the harvest tax until the farms can handle higher taxings.¤food#-10Öhapp#5/My kingdom demands its harvest more now than ever, increase the tax so my people do not go hungry.¤happ#-10Öfood#-10/4¤none

e3p1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, Royal Family wishes to expand the your lands into the West. Onto the fertile land that now belongs to the farmers and their brethren who feed there. They ask for your approval of this./Those land are not for the family to take.¤happ#0/Remove the entire community and build a palace on it for the family.¤happ#-15Ögold#10/Let the farming community keep the piece of land but add a tax for it. Distribute the excess to the family .¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Usurp the land, create a palace and hire the farmers under the land owned by the royals.¤happ#-15Ögold#-10/4¤e3p2

e3p2Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, The farmers of the West have begun to throw meat onto Palace walls, setting the crops on fire and injuring royals!/This matter have to solve itself.¤happ#10Ögold#-10/Set up a meeting with the head of the farmers and the royals to discuss the land.¤happ#10Öfood#-15/Banish all farmers from the land for riot and bad behavior.¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Bring in the army to fight them off but make no decision of the land.¤happ#10Ögold#-10/4¤e3p3

e3p3Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, Due to the riots between the farmers and the Royals, almost all the crops were destroyed and our food storage is running low do to it./What is done is done.¤happ#-15Öfood#-15/Import food from the neighbouring country.¤happ#10Ögold#-15/Make the farmers suffer for their decision and pay for the food.¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Kill all the farmers for this treachery.¤happ#-10Öfood#-10/4¤none

e4p1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, I have received word that the showers are belated for over two fortnights, the harvest may wither if we do not act in haste!/Pray the Lord and may the heavens quench the thirst of our soils!¤food#-15/Gather townsfolk to irrigate the fields.¤happ#-10Öfood#10/Punish the wicked of this kingdom, as they are responsible for this terrible fate!¤food#-5Öhapp#-15/Ration the resources, one pint of water and a fistful o flour per household!¤happ#-5Öfood#5/4¤e4p2

e4p2Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, the country is plagued by drought, the harvest will not deliver!/My Kingdom has survived worse!¤food#-5Öhapp#-10/Gather townsfolk to irrigate the fields.¤happ#-15Öfood#5/Bargain grains from the neighbouring kingdom.¤food#10Ögold#-15/none/3¤none

e30p1Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, villains with their vile daggers! Roaming clean through the bounds of our fair kingdom! Shall I put this business into my own dispatch?/We can waste our gold and such filth, the outskirts can handle themselves.¤food#-5Öhapp#-10/We can not have robbers roaming around in my kingdom! Take as many men you need.¤happ#10Ögold#5/Set up a reward for capturing them.¤gold#-5Öhapp#-15/none/3¤e30p2

e30p2Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, the dungeons repleted with villains, I stand at your command!/Let is be for now. Its better to have them in there then out here with the people.¤food#-5Ögold#-5/They are just filth Ser, hang them all!¤happ#-5Öfood#10/Make them work down in the quarries as punishment instead¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/none/3¤none

e31Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, In what particular thought to work I know not, But seemeth it as a monstrosity is tormenting the commoners. Souls and bodies hath it divorced four!/Tis is flibbertigibbet, I shall be much bound to thee for not wasting my time hereafter!¤happ#-10/Ser Godfrey, strike at it with your partisan! May this end without the perdition of more souls!¤happ#10Ögold#-5/Dispatch a missive, a handsome reward to whom seizes this beast.¤gold#-10Öhapp#5/none/3¤none

e32p1Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, words being given to me that a queer vessels being ravaged, methinks by pirates. Just a league shy of our shore/Nay, this affair touches us not!¤happ#-10/I fear we shall come too late, rescue them at all haste.¤happ#-5/Dispatch a fleet, rid all the sea of pirates!.¤gold#-10/none/3¤e32p2

e11Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, recent heavy rains caused local floods and damaged building and fields./The weather is not under my rule and as such I will not meddle with it more than needed.¤happ#-20/Set aside some of our coins forward to helping where its needed in the city.¤gold#-15Öhapp#15/These floodings are an increasing problem in the city hire some builders to erect a sturdy dam for the river.¤gold#-5Öfood-5/My kingdom can not afford to send help to repair all this damage. But this rain has been a problem for us all, send out bread and food from our storage to help the ones affected.¤happ#10Öfood#-15/4¤none

e12Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, savages are plundering mountain villages close to our north border./If its outside my kingdoms border its not my kingdoms problem.¤gold#0/The savages have gotten more bold lately, soon they with move into my kingdom if we let them be. Send a company of riders north to make sure the savages never again get close to our border.¤gold#-10Öhapp#10/Does poor villagers, it must be hard to live so far north. Station a guard company up there to help them.¤gold#-5Öhapp5/none/3¤none

e13p1Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, there is well known explorer, who ask you to fund expedition to discover new lands for your kingdom./Neither I nor my Kingdom require new lands so badly that we would set such task in the hands of a mare explorer no matter how many common folk know him.¤gold#0/Ah! New land for my kingdom would sit well. Give him three ships to find these new lands and tell him to claim them under my name.¤gold#-10Öfood#-10/There is likely no new lands to claim anymore but tell him that I with gift him 1 ship to search for new trade in the faraway lands¤gold#-5/none/3¤e13p2

e13p2Åc1Åi1/Your Majesty, the explorer has come back from his eventful journey at sea and claims the he has found a great new land for your kingdom./The kingdom cannot manage and does not need any more lands.¤happ#-5/Perfect! Just what I was hoping for, arrange for settling these new lands for my kingdom.¤gold#-20Öhapp#15/Well I did not expect him to find new land, but if it is as he claims arrange for a small convoy of our own to see these great lands he speaks about.¤gold#-10/I did not ask for new land! I asked for trade! Tell him to set sail again and to not come without trade this time around.¤gold#5Öhapp#-5/4¤none

e14Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, art merchant offers another genuine Mona Sarah. It would be our fifth. Should we buy it?/I do not care about this staff. Do not bother me with that again!¤gold#0/My father already lost fortune buying those nonsense! Show him out of the city so people can see what we do with thieves like this!¤happ#5/Yes! What if this one is the genuine one? Buy it!¤gold#-15/none/3¤none

e15Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, we have found new gold veins in High Mountains. This could dramatically improve our treasury./I have more pressing issues now.¤gold#0/Get some men and open a mine!¤happ#-5Ögold#20/Open the mine and give workers share of the profit!¤gold#15Öhapp#10/none/3¤none

e16Åc2Åi1/Your Majesty, there is not enough funds for this years Yule celebration. But the people will be very disappointed to see the kingdom not follow through with this tradition./Do nothing and let people be disappointed.¤happ#-20/Tax the people and earn the money required to buy fireworks. If the people want to celebrate, they must pay a share for it.¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Ask the Church to announce that Fireworks are the devil and will not be allowed in the kingdom anymore.¤happ#-20Ögold#-5/Take out some of the money kept aside for food, crops and use it for the Fireworks instead.¤food#-20Ögold#10/4¤none

e20p1Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, Preachers are gathering and agitating the common folk at the town centre, to worship a new kind of deity./Let them preach, faith has never hurt anyone.¤happ#15/These so called preachers are a burden on my kingdom. Make the city-guard help them remove themselves¤gold#-10/none/none/2¤e20p2

e20p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, It seems like the common folk have started to join and convert to this new faith that has gained popularity in your land./There is always a faith that will come and always a faith that will go. Let the faithful be faithful I would say.¤gold#0/We can not have my subjects follow such profanity. Set up a new law that any mention of the divinity will be granted a whip lash for each mention.¤happ#-15/If faith in this divinity makes my subjects happy I would say we should reward this faith.Find a mason and set him to erect a monument for this divinity.¤happ#10Ögold#-10/none/3¤none

e21p1Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, your virtuous rule is one of the fairest among men, and the empire can attest that. Alas, I beseech you to spread out reign towards the Southern Plains, occupied by boorish men who deserve not to./Methinks the time is unbeseeming! Alas my Lady, be patient¤happ#-10/Its high time indeed, dispatch an armed expedition and claim the lands¤gold#-15Öhapp#5/Though its a grand idea, thine approach be blunt. Nay my Lady, seal thou this league in a more civic manner¤gold#-10Öhapp#5/none/3¤e21p2

e21p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, the Southern Plains were annexed! Manage the lands however you think best. Our horizons have expanded, our country now two fold and at your high command./May the Southern Plains remain untouched¤gold#0/May the fields be used to favour our harvest.¤food#20/May the soil be exploited for riches¤gold#20/May the land serve to construct houses for the needy.¤happ#20/2¤none

e32p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, ferried fellows have arrived from the most exotic sort, merchants it seems. Their freight was lost at sea and at the hands of the looters, so of no value to us. Shall I get rid of them or welcome instead?/Such traders, with nothing to trade. Expel these goons from my kingdom!¤happ#-10/Nay, they have endured such a fate, see that they get proper accommodation¤gold#-5Öhapp#5/A handsome amount of our men perished in their rescue, to no avail! Execute them promptly¤happ#-15/Their rescue is been costly, attend them but bid them farewell, the instant the dawn breaks.¤gold#5/4¤e32p3

e32p3Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, the Ambassador of the Kingdom of Trigarta has fared great distances to have an audience with your Grace. When shall I arrange for this parley?/It is of no relevance to me having an audience with this stranger¤happ#-5/At noon¤gold#0/When the sun breaks¤gold#0/We shall parley in the evening.¤gold#0/4¤none

e24Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, there are comedians in the town, who ask for permission to perform here. Must we take part in their humour, me lord, the decision is on you./Well, who cares…¤happ#-5/Give them my permission¤happ#10/Great! Welcome them and provide them comfort they deserve!¤gold#5Öhapp#20/none/3¤none

e25p1Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, King Charles would like to seal our friendship with marriage proposal to his oldest daughter. My Lord, might you be prepared to take up this offer?/I don not want to get married now.¤gold#0/Such a great idea!¤gold#10/Prepare great feast and let whole kingdom celebrate.¤happ#20/none/3¤e25p2

e25p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, the tide hath flow by your side. Congratulations! It is a boy! Finally you have descendant!/Fine, but I am working now. Can you remind me later?¤gold#0/Great news! I am so blessed man!¤food#0/Prepare great feast and let whole kingdom celebrate.¤happ#20Ögold#-10/none/3¤none

e26p1Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, I have chanced upon a worthy rumour. They say a new dictator is being borned in the Far West. A good orator, you must look into this man lest his words blow thy crown off thy head./Do nothing, as he poses no threat as of now.¤gold#0/Banish the man from the kingdom and send him to Exile.¤happ#-15Ögold#-10/Find the man and appoint him as a senior minister in the Kingdom.¤happ#20/Threaten to terminate the citizenship of any man who follows the orders of the dictator is seen as part of his league.¤happ#-20Ögold#-5/4¤e26p2

e27p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, the Church has decided to curse at the skies that our land will be throttled by the fiery Tempest for seven forthcoming years. The people are scared and have not left their homes in three days me lord./Do nothing about it.¤happ#-10Ögold#20/Declare that no church can predict weather and the Tempest is untrue premonition.¤happ#-10Ögold10/Propose to the people to choose a new religion and religious leader to follow instead of the church¤happ#10Ögold#-20/Apologize to the church regarding the dissolution and donate a huge some of money to it.¤happ#5Ögold#-20/4¤none

e26p2Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, the tides seem rough this day. What I foresaw, has finally happened! People and running angry on the streets, burning houses because of their beloved dictator!/Do nothing about it.¤food#-20Ögold#-20/Send out the Army to contain the revolt.¤happ#-20Ögold#-20/Bring him back from exile and appoint as a minister.¤happ#20Ögold#-10/Ask the priest to exorcise all the people revolting and take out the devil from inside them.¤happ#-20Ögold#-20/4¤none

e27p1Åc1Åi1/Your Grace, oh what has becomest of womenfolk today, I say. Our nuns from the monastery drank forth all the wine kept aside for and were found at the gates of your palace!/Do nothing about it.¤happ#-10/Make an example of the nuns and publicly embarrass them for blasphemous behavior, banishing them in the end.¤happ#20Ögold#-10/Declare the kingdom to be a liberal state and let the nuns go with a small fine, but dissolve the church.¤happ#20Ögold#-15/Declare a ban on all kinds of alcohol, unless authorized by the King, the royal family or the main priest of the church.¤happ#-20Ögold#10/4¤e27p2

resources.string: Oh, your heiniess… Rats attacked our city. I hope you have enjoyed the show, because due to your reluctance, soon we wont have food to eat.
Oh, your heiniess… Why hiring Rats to deal with rats?
Oh, your heiniess… Cats from all over the kingdom stands ready and awaits your commands!
Oh, your heiniess… Todays chefs special is rats cooked with root vegetable. Our beloved subjects brought so many rats, that we have enough meat until Spring.
Oh, your heiniess… Farmers have problems and what you do? Nothing. How royal!
Oh, your heiniess… Farmers are releived, that you lowered the taxes. But whats better? Happy, but hungry farmers, or grumpy ones with enough food?
Oh, your heiniess… Farmers are releived, that you lowered the taxes. But whats better? Happy, but hungry farmers, or grumpy ones with enough food?
Oh, your heiniess… You showed those laze farmers, who do nothing all day long who rules here.

Bravo my Lord! Large empires are always pathetic like the Roman Empire, in the years to come not a soul will know remember such a name! Arbitrea will be the kingdom everyone will remember with fondness!
Your Heiniess, oversea colonies are the latest trend at this moment, good to see our fair country joining all our neighbours in the invading and pillaging of foreign lands!
Your Heiniess, wise command, this honest jester can assure you, if these terrains are worth a looting, Lord Ludvig will most certainly know!

Oh Your Heiniess, what shall be done with these explorers? Always exploring further away than what they are commanded to! If the cahp cannot read a sea chart, he perhaps should find a better suited office
Oh Your Heiniess, of course not, conflicting beliefs has and never will be a catalyst for violence! This jester can assure you, they will get well along
Your Heiniess, a brave an wise move, though some folks may regard this as repression, but fear not, they are of the same sort that claims that all men are born equal!
Your Heiniess, As fair as your command is, this stage of freedom can be seen as debauchery! If your grace is not careful, next time they will want to refuse to pay taxes!
Your Heiniess, such benevolence in yer command, in this manner, by each whip lash, infidels will adore whatever deity your Grace desires ‘em to.
Your Heiniess, such a fair command, yet we cannot spare to raise a monument for each idol that comes forth. This humble jester commends you to act more prudently next time.
Your Heiniess, in an attempt of not coming off blunt, may this simple jester raise the question, what is the reward in yer passiveness?
Your Heiniess, these terrains constitute a gift nature has granted us! The prevailing inhabitants of those lands are keeping us from our divine right! It is only fair we execute the bandits!
Your Heiniess, ‘tis a great scheme to annex this land to our reign, alas the tolerant approach is worrying this humble jester. As your Grace is not exactly known as an alms-giving sovereign.
Your Heiniess, a wise plot for these new lands, laying claim to a barren territory to eventually leave it as it was, is good enough. The difference is that now these desolated lands are ours!
Your Heiniess, a wise plot for the new claimed lands, this servile jester assures you that people will not go hungry this winter, nor the rats that still inhabit the plains for that matter!

Your Heiniess, a wise plot for the new claimed lands, this honest jester assures you that gold will not be an issue for the kingdom anymore, not at least ‘till the resource is spent on the castle ampliations your Grace has planned of course!

Your Heiniess, a wise plot for the new claimed lands, this lenient jester assures you that folks will rejoice, at least until them new dens get overcrowded by the boastful ammount of needy people that lives in this land!

Your Heiniess does not need any more comedians! The plump buffoon, that behaves as if everything is a joke; The sour old timer that has seen better days; The amusingly covetous fellow and the snobbish princess without a crown! Oh and me of course!
Oh Your Heiniess, allowing fellow comedians to perform! What a pleasant surprise! I do hope your Grace is not looking for jester replacements!
Oh Your Heiniess, treating foreign performers with such warmth! This local jester would not mind such a preferential treatment as well!

Oh Your Heiniess, always making well thought decisions! That princess is up to no good! This rightful jester assures you, that behind all that charity, uncountable fortune and exuberant beauty, she’s a wench!
Oh Your Heiniess, Congratulations! The news is all over town, this truthful jester assures you, that arranged marriages always brings happiness to all parties, specially the spouses!

Oh Your Heiniess, Congratulations! This sincere jester assures you, that the whole kingdom will celebrate the engagement, alas in their own dens, without the vast amounts of wine and food. But celebrating nonetheless!
Oh Your Heiniess, parental skills are innate to your grace! This child is blessed with the outmost concerning father and will grow old knowing that!
Oh Your Heiniess, ‘tis a blessing indeed, yet another new addition to the royal family, for me to serve and amuse, I’ve been blessed as well…
Oh Your Heiniess, a feast for the common folk? Let these novel events not bedim your future decisions!
Oh Your Heiniess, Benevolence overall, most likely this man just wanted to acquaint himself with the glory of fame. Fear not my lord, ‘tis a fad, folks only desire you to govern over them!
Oh Your Heiniess, in an attempt to not come off as blunt, is it not exile a too harsh sanction for a great orator like this man? Lady Laurent can be excessively precautious
Oh Your Heiniess, with the most utmost respect, a rebel this caliber, specially one that desires power does not deserves the fair treatment your Grace offers. Off with his head I would advise!
Oh Your Heiniess, threatening with expatriation’s a proper punishment for rebels who plot against your rule. Hopefully they will not be enough to create their own nation!
Oh Your Heiniess, this rebellion affair has both made us gloomy, this tuneful jester can perform for your Grace some cheerful sonnets, as soon as the protesting outside stops!
A most wise decision, fighting fire with fire will prove the commoners that there is but one hand in the kingdom that gives commands, and that is your Heiniess!
Oh Your Heiniess, with due respect, bring back a rebel from exile and offer him hospitality? He certainly deserves a much worse fate
Oh Your Heiniess will be remembered for ages to come by making such brilliant decisions!
Oh Your Heiniess, hope this prudent jester’s advice don’t come off as too blunt, but a punishment has to be made, nuns can and should not commit such a crime”

Oh Your Heiniess, the guilt o the guilt of these sinners! Surely this example will be enough to avoid similar occurrences in the future. Your Grace will see how the kingdom will sober up by the morrow.
Oh Your Heiniess, fine and proper as always! The believers among the folk will certainly be understanding about the dissolution of their temple!
Oh Your Heiniess, a prohibition like this definitely work. Nobody will object at your rule. And the citizens of this kingdom are honest enough to not consume unauthorized alcohol
Oh Your Heiniess, Would your Grace ignore this premonition? This skeptical jester agrees, although them clouds looks awkward today!

Oh Your Heiniess, this fearful jester would never doubt yer word, but what would we do in the event of this coming true? Your Grace is worth of my trust but, as a matter of fact, them clouds looks awkward today!
Oh Your Heiniess, even the wisest men repents! Alas your Grace should build a new cathedral as well!
Oh Your Heiniess, a terrific idea to appease the commoners! This believing jester suggest your Grace to become their all-around ruler and spiritual leader!
Oh your Heiniess, You must certainly will be remembered for yer wit! Let the fittest survive in this jungle!
Your Heiniess, nowadays the scoundrels roaming freely outside the kingdom are more important than the ones flooding the streets inside yer kingdom! What has the world come up to!
Oh your Heiniess, with all these handsome rewards, this jester wonders if the honest citizens of this fair kingdom, would be fair enough to not willfully accusate their fellow neighbors
Oh your Heiniess, this wisdom of yours, they’re villains after all, not people! Why associate ‘em?
Oh your Heiniess, mercyful as always, them dungeons certainly seem more vacant now
Oh your Heiniess, hard work is undoubtedly the path to freedom, these villains will certainly be thankful once they achieve their liberation
Oh your Heiniess, you are in the right, why wasting your time in these gossips about monsters, when you can use that same time to explain your kingdom, how were these commoners slain
Oh Your Heiniess, I have yet to receive notice from Ser Godfrey, this jester wonders how he’d fared against this murderous beast…
Oh your Heiniess, what a great command, may this ludicrous fool ask, how plausible is the scenario of commoners capturing a such vile beast?
Oh Your Heiniess, always so magnanimous, is evident, had they been in our moccasins they would have done the same
Oh your Heiniess, this jester hopes, for our troops sake, that these foul corsairs are all too tired from the plundering to have a go at our men
Your Heiniess, prompt in voice and command as well, fencing fire with fire is as clever as it is logical for this affair
Oh Your Heiniess, we need not to show hospitality towards strangers, especially if they arrive to us empty handed. Your Grace has acted most accordingly!
Oh Your Heiniess, this devoted jester is well informed of the fate occurred to these “merchants” but performing in this samaritan manner, might attract more stranded chaps to these lands!
Oh Your Heiniess, your accurate command never ceases to impress this ordinary jester, examples like this will make castaways ponder twice before setting a foot in these lands!
Oh Your Heiniess, a hasteful farewell is just what these fools deserve, who cares if their vessel and crew were recently ravaged? Your Grace also have seen hard days at the throne
Oh Your Heiniess, a parley with a foreign ambassador? Your Grace is in the right, this affair seems queer, Who knows what evil can this person bring upon us!
Oh Your Heiniess, a parley with a foreign ambassador? Must certainly due to the wise decisions your Grace have commanded!
Oh Your Heiniess, a parley with a foreign ambassador? Must certainly due to the wise decisions your Grace have commanded!
Oh Your Heiniess, a parley with a foreign ambassador? Must certainly due to the wise decisions your Grace have commanded!

Gustav II Adolf
Charles IV
Richard I
Cleopatra
Caesar
Alexander Great
Louis XIV
Louis XVI
Caligula
Bloody mary
Nero
Henry VI
Ghenghis Kahn

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cleopatra
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caesar
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_the_Great
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sun_King
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_XVI_of_France
